reviewText:
If you want to be teased into ecstasy, this is the one for you. It does please, but oh-so-slowly; yikes!
Girls like to check out other girls, so your girlfriend can learn some turn-ons if you watch it together.

Eight scenes featuring ten gals, all are caucasion. It begins with a Southern Belle who disrobes to music. The camera lingers on her face and body for an appropriate amount of time. She spends time cupping herself.

Next is a pirate gal with hand cuffs and pouring water upon herself.

Then there is an Indian Maiden and a cowgirl which includes kissing, a bananna and going down upon one another, but not explictedly.

A nurse and then Latin Sizzle which features a gal that is dressed in a sombrero and a colorful dress.

Following that is a Cops and Robbers with two gals who also pleasure each other.

Next is a Rich Girl and finally a blond waitress on roller skates who has a piercing and a tat.  She eats a strawberry and has whipped cream.

All the scenes are accompanied with music, if the scenes are played from the menu each gal gives a brief spoken introduction. About what you would get at a table at a club, but for much less and from the comfort of your home.

I got this DVD beause of Erin Avery.  She has two scenes so I got more than I hoped.  There are only four women in eight scenes.  Two are girl/girl the others are solo scenes.  The photography was good and the scenes a good length but not as explicit as other Peach DVD's so I can't go five stars but it is a good show worth buying.
